title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.7 - Medical examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.7 - Medical examinations

State Regulations

The director of the claims medical department shall make or
cause to be made such inspections and examinations of persons claiming payment
of workers' compensation or disability benefits from the State Fund as may be
required and shall furnish reports thereof. He shall also provide such
supervision of medical and surgical treatment as may be consistent with the
provisions of law. Notes

450.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
